data.name: Fogtown: Mystery of the Missing Crime
data.detailed_description:
Guide the brilliant (but easily distracted) Sherblock and his stalwart companion Blockson through a madcap mystery where you control the outcome! Will you solve the case or plunge the city of Fogtown into chaos?



FOGTOWN: Mystery of the Missing Crime is a modern take on the old-school interactive movie genre, and the first of its kind made with puppets. Rather than directly controlling the characters, you'll regularly pick from a series of options that branch the story into fun new directions, all leading to multiple different endings. The result is a rollicking, madcap adventure that feels like an interactive, replayable episode of your favorite comedy television show. (No wonder FOGTOWN is being made into a TV pilot too!)



Don't tell Sherblock and Blockson... but you're secretly in control of their fates from the beginning to the end! Make choices that solve their mystery, or leave them scratching their blocks!



Created by a team of twenty-year comedy film short veterans, FOGTOWN features a voice cast of renowned adventure game actors such as Dean Erickson (Gabriel Knight himself from 1995's The Beast Within), Lenval Brown (narrator of Disco Elysium), Paul Morgan Stetler (Curtis Craig in Phantasmagoria: A Puzzle of Flesh) and Rupert Booth (Inspector Jenks from Contradiction and DuPont from The Shapeshifting Detective)!

FEATURES:
  • Elaborate hand-crafted backgrounds and finger puppets
  • Tongue-in-cheek homage to the world of Sherlock Holmes
  • Zany, fast-paced antics unlike any FMV game you've played
  • The same hilarious writing from the Fogtown TV show that no one's seen yet
  • Unlockable achievements for multiple story paths — even the ones where you didn't achieve much of anything!
  • Short enough to complete and then get a refund from Steam! (Except then you’ll miss all the fun replayable bits.)

data.short_description: Crime has vanished from the city of Fogtown... or has it? Sherblock and Blockson are on the case to find out where it's all gone, uncovering a deep conspiracy and causing mayhem (in equal measure). A point-and-click puppet-based comedy joyride!
